column1: Funeral services for Dave will be held on Monday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 A.M. at St. John's Lutheran Church
column6: with Pastor Frank Rose officiating. Burial will follow at Salemville Cemetery.  Visitation will be held on Sunday
column8: 2015 from 4:00 to 8:00 P.M. at Markesan Community Funeral Home
column12: 2015 from 10:00 A.M. until the hour of service at church.
